```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(fivethirtyeight)
```

```{r}
bechdel <- bechdel
bechdel <- bechdel %>%
  filter(year >= 1990)
```

```{r}
set.seed(33)
sample1 <- sample_n(bechdel, 200)
```


```{r}
# Write the data to an excel file
write_csv(sample1, 'bechdelSample.csv', col_names = TRUE)
```

```{r}
sample1 %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(domgross, na.rm = TRUE))
```

```{r}
try1 <- sample1 %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  mutate(total = n()) %>%
  group_by(year, binary) %>%
  mutate(passNum = ifelse(binary == "PASS", n(), total-n() ) )
```

```{r}
ggplot(try1, aes(y= passNum, x = year))+
  geom_line()
```
